title: kryptex
author: kryptex
created_time: September 29, 2023, 10:44:49 AMLast edit: February 04, 2025, 04:05:32 PM by kryptex
content: https://pool.kryptex.com/Kryptex pool — the best PPS+/PROP/SOLO pool for professionals!Available coins: BTC | IRON | ALPH |CFX | KAS | NEXA | ERG | RVN | XMR | ETC | ETHW | ZEPH | KLS | XNA | CLORE | NIR | SDR | XEL | OCTA | SAL | RXD | BLOCX | BCH | FB | LTC+DOGE+BELLS | QUAI/\ Click a coin and get a mining guide /\Advantages of Kryptex pool:1. No registration and complete anonymity. Support for SSL mining.2. Low fees. Payouts every hour. We pay the network fees for you.3. Payout system [PPS+ (Pay Per Share) — we pay for each share.    - We always pay, while PPLNS only pays for a found block.    - Your income is always maximum and does not depend on the pool's luck.    - Smooth accruals — easy to check and plan income.4. We support dual-mining on the most profitable bundles!5. Supporting ASICs and FPGAs for different coins and algorithms.6. Supporting hashrate rentals. Fully compatible with MiningRigRentals and Nicehash.7. Telegram-bot for monitoring your rigs. Monitor the state of your mining rigs and pool income 24/7.8. In the workers' section of the pool, we showcase the miner versions being used. Rest assured, we always strive to maximize your income! Here's how we do it:    - Whenever a new version of the miner is released, we'll promptly notify you;    - If you happen to be using an outdated version, we'll provide a direct download link for the latest update.9. We give you the opportunity to mine with auto-exchange in BTC without additional fees!10. Professional support.Community:- Discord: https://discord.gg/umKYJybWdX- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/kryptex- Telegram chat: https://t.me/kryptex_chat_en- Twitter: https://twitter.com/KryptexMining- Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCe4y3AHo2fX2Hm_blgRzEJg- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kryptex- Facebook: https://facebook.com/kryptex.orgUseful links:- Knowledge Base: https://pool.kryptex.com/articles- Best Mining GPUs: https://www.kryptex.com/best-gpus-for-mining- Overclocking Database: https://www.kryptex.com/overclocking- Mining with auto-exchange: https://pool.kryptex.com/en/articles/account-mining-en- Mining Calculator: https://www.kryptex.com/en/mining-calculatorAny questions or suggestions? Contact us in any convenient way:- Online Support: https://www.kryptex.com/en/support/tickets- Discord: https://discord.gg/umKYJybWdX- Telegram: https://t.me/kryptex

comments.author: kryptex
comments.body: Kryptex Pool has launched a comparison table for ASIC miners! https://pool.kryptex.com/en/device/asicJust like Kryptex's The Best GPUs for Mining, but for ASICs!- Choose the Best ASIC: The table helps to compare different models and make an informed choice of an ASIC.- Calculating Potential Profits: Find out the profitability of different ASICs per day, month, or year. Calculate net profit and learn the payback period considering electricity cost.- Detailed Specifications: We provide technical specifications for each device. Discover which ASIC suits you best regarding noise level and power consumption.- Charts and Instructions: The table includes profitability charts and the links to detailed setup instructions for each miner.Only the most relevant, efficient, and profitable ASICs have entered our table. Start mining with maximum efficiency right from the beginning.Stay tuned for updates — we will add even more useful features soon!

comments.author: kryptex
comments.body: Kryptex launches new referral program on Kryptex Pool Start earning 20% of our pool fee for every miner you invite!- Previously, earnings were limited to App users. Now, they extend to pool miners as well. It means more ASICs, mining rigs, and more gigahashes.- Your invitees have the flexibility to mine any coins they prefer. We'll collect the earnings from all pools and put them in your kryptex.com balance in Bitcoins. Invited miners lose nothing, we cover the payments from our funds.- You can withdraw your earnings in Bitcoin, USDT, or AdvCash.Get your referral link in your Kryptex account: https://www.kryptex.com/referral/  Start sharing the link, invite others to Kryptex Pool, and earn money!

comments.author: kryptex
comments.body: Kryptex launches Zephyr (ZEPH) pool! Increase your CPU mining income by up to 5X compared to XMR. Mine on Windows, HiveOS, Linux, MacOSMine ZEPH on Kryptex Pool — https://pool.kryptex.com/zephPool address: zeph.kryptex.network:7777- We are testing the new PROP payout system. The block reward is distributed between miners proportionally and awarded when a block is found. The higher pool’s luck — the greater reward for the miners!- Pool fee 1%, we pay commission for payments for you.- ZEPH payouts to your own wallet, or in BTC to your Kryptex account.   How to connect to the pool? — https://pool.kryptex.com/en/articles/how-to-mine-zephyr-enWhere can I get a wallet for ZEPH? — https://pool.kryptex.com/en/articles/zephyr-wallet-en

comments.author: kryptex
comments.body: SOLO mining for ZEPH, KLS and PYI already available — https://pool.kryptex.com/What is SOLO mining? You receive all the profit from the mining block!How to connect?Just add "solo:" before your mining wallet address, KLS as the example:"solo:karlsen:qp5frzk7...que"You can also mine to your Kryptex account with BTC exchange. The same method:"solo:email@gmail.com/worker"Got a lot of mining rigs, lots of hashing power, or just want to try your luck? Now this is possible with Kryptex Pool!Other coins will also appear soon, stay tuned!

comments.author: kryptex
comments.body: We are happy to share the good news! We launched our BTC PPS+ Pool! SHA256 and SHA256 Boost ASICs supported.Connect now — https://pool.kryptex.com/btcPool Address: stratum+tcp://btc.kryptex.network:7777Pass: `x` or leave blank   True PPS+, pool fee 3%, minimum payout threshold 0.001 BTC.- Detailed guide how to mine BTC on Kryptex PPS+ Pool.or…  Start mining directly to your Kryptex account and withdraw USDT from 1.5$, BTC, ETH, AdvCash.To start mining directly to the Kryptex account, use your Kryptex email as the wallet address, with the worker name slash-seperated. Example: user@gmail.com/Antminer_s9d- Detailed guide how to mine BTC to your Kryptex account.

comments.author: kryptex
comments.body: Kryptex Pool launches geo-mining Geo-mining now available for KAS and ALPH mining pools — https://pool.kryptex.com/Connect to the nearest server to reduce latency.KAS Pool Address:Global: `stratum+tcp://kas.kryptex.network:7777`Asia: `stratum+tcp://kas-sg.kryptex.network:7011`USA: `stratum+tcp://kas-us.kryptex.network:7011`Brazil: `stratum+tcp://kas-br.kryptex.network:7011`ALPH Pool Address:Global: `stratum+tcp://alph.kryptex.network:7777`Asia: `stratum+tcp://alph-sg.kryptex.network:7010`USA: `stratum+tcp://alph-us.kryptex.network:7010`Brazil: `stratum+tcp://alph-br.kryptex.network:7010` You can ping the servers from your PC to see if it makes sense for you. If your latency decreases — we recommend switching.
